Package edu.ntnu.Backend.controller

Class SubjectController

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.Backend.controller.SubjectController
@RequestMapping("/api") @RestController @CrossOrigin public class SubjectController extends Object
A controller for the api calls towards the subjects.

  • Method Details

    • getSubjectsForUser

      @PostMapping("/user/subjects") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getSubjectsForUser(@RequestBody TokenDTO token)
      A method to get all the subjects for a given user.
      Parameters:
      token - The specific format of data that is needed. See TokenDTO for more information.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of the subjectDAOs contained within a response entity, or a http status forbidden if the user is not logged-in.

    • addSubject

      @PostMapping("admin/addSubject") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity addSubject(@RequestBody SubjectDTO subjectDTO)
      A method for an admin to add a subject.
      Parameters:
      subjectDTO - The specific format of data that is needed. See SubjectDTO for more information.
      Returns:
      Returns a response entity with the status of the request, or a http status forbidden if the user is not logged-in. The user also have to be of the role admin for the forbidden response to not be triggered.

    • removeSubject

      @PostMapping("admin/removeSubject") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity removeSubject(@RequestBody SubjectDTO subjectDTO)
      A method for an admin to remove a subject.
      Parameters:
      subjectDTO - The specific format of data that is needed. See SubjectDTO for more information.
      Returns:
      Returns a response entity with the status of the request, or a http status forbidden if the user is not logged-in. The user also have to be of the role admin for the forbidden response to not be triggered.

    • getASpecificSubject

      @PostMapping("user/subject") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getASpecificSubject(@RequestBody SubjectIdDTO subjectIdDTO)
      A method to get a specific subject for a user.
      Parameters:
      subjectIdDTO - The specific format of data that is needed. See SubjectIdDTO for more information.
      Returns:
      Returns a response entity containing the specific subject. As with the other methods of this class this method may also return a http status forbidden if the user is not logged-in.
